channel.title: Hi I'm Fabien - no product yet
channel.description:
Hello everyone, I'm Fabien. I've been a developer for almost 15 years now - working mainly in Java doing web dev (B2B, B2C), e-commerce and a bit of mobile development.
For many years now I've been interested in building a product of my own that would bring value. I would love to come up with some problems to solve and turn them into successful saas products. I'm currently brainstorming, trying to find my first problem/idea combo.
Right now I hope to learn from all of you, the great people of the bootstraping community!

item.title: Hi I'm Fabien - no product yet
item.dc:creator: andrey
item.description:
Hello Fabien. Welcome to the forums.

Read full topic
